Description: Long sandy beach with sunrise views and food stalls
Short boat trips to the nearby island for birdwatching and beaches
Mangrove sanctuary with guided boat safaris and birdlife
Observe local fishing activities and sample fresh seafood
Historic lighthouse and coastal viewpoints perfect for photos
Flat coastal ride suitable for casual cycling and sunrise rides
Market walk tasting local Andhra seafood and street snacks
Day-trip kayaking and small-boat exploration of backwaters
Guided walk through fishing villages for cultural photography
